DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects authentication events from devices running FreeBSD. This also requires the configuration of OpenSSH and PAM to watch the same logfile to capture everything

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: 19 HostScan (ssh - Did not receive identification string)

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+)\s+(\S+)\s*[^:]* ([^[:]+)[^:]*:\s*(pam_unix\([^)]+\)): authentication failure; logname=(\S*) uid=(\S*) euid=(\S*) tty=(\S*) ruser=(\S*) rhost=(\S+).*

FastPattern.description: 25 UserAuthAudit (ssh - pam_unix: check pass; user unknown)
26 UserAuthAudit {ssh,CRON} - pam_unix: session opened for user
27 UserAuthAudit {ssh,CRON} - pam_unix: session closed for user)
28 UserLogonFailure (sshd - error: PAM: authentication failure for illegal user)
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+)\s+(\S+)\s*[^:]* ([^[:]+)[^:]*:\s*[^:]+:\s* (\S+): Authentication failure for illegal user\s*(\S*)\s* from (\S+).*

FastPattern.description: 32 UserAuthAudit (sshd - auth could not identify password)
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+)\s+(\S+)\s*[^:]* ([^[:]+)[^:]*:\s*(pam_unix\([^)]+\)): auth could not identify password for \[(.*)\].*
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ \w+ sshd\[\d+\]: pam_unix\(sshd:auth\): auth could not identify password for \[.+\]

FastPattern.description: 34 ServiceWarning (sshd - Keyboard-interactive userauth failed while authenticating)

FastPattern.pattern: \sssh\S+\[\d+\]: \[.*?\] error: Could not get shadow information
sshd\[\d+\]:[^:]+: \S+ attempting to validate locked account

FastPattern.description: 45, ServiceWarning sshd: No such file or directory
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: lastlog_openseek: Couldn't stat [/\w]+: No such file or directory

FastPattern.description: 46, FailedAuthentication SSH Disconnecting: Too many authentication/password failures
48, RemoteConsoleAccess address mis-match: POSSIBLE BREAK-IN ATTEMPT!
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.-]+)(?: \S+:\S+)? (sshd)\[\d+\]: Address (\S+) maps to (\S+), but this does not map back to the address - (.+)
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: .*, but this does not map back to the address - POSSIBLE BREAK-IN ATTEMPT!

FastField.defaultValue: "$4" maps to "$5", but this does not map back to the address

FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: pam_succeed_if\([^\)]+\): error retrieving information about \S+

FastPattern.description: 51 UserAuthAudit pam_unix: session opened for user
FastPattern.pattern: su: pam_unix\S* session opened for user

FastPattern.description: 52 UserLogon pam_krbs: authentication succeeds for user
53 UserLogoff pam_unix: session closed for user
FastPattern.pattern: (?:su: pam_unix\S*|login: pam_unix\S*) session closed for user \S+

FastPattern.description: 54, FailedAuthentication SSH Disconnecting: Too many authentication failures

FastPattern.pattern: \sssh\S*\[\d+\]: User=\S+ tty=\S+ host=\S+ failed to login after \d+ attempts

FastPattern.description: 61, ServiceInfo Password for user will expire
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: [^)]+\): password for user \S+ will expire in \d+ days
sshd\[\d+\]: Authentication refused: bad ownership or modes for file \S+

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+)\s+(\S+)\s*[^:]* ([^[:]+)\s(sshd)\S+\[\d+\]: user=(\S+) partition=(\S+) level=(\S+) tty=(\S+) host=(\S+) attempts=(\d+).*
FastPattern.pattern: \sssh\S+\[\d+\]: user=\S+ partition=\S+ level=\S+ tty=\S+ host=\S+ attempts=\d+

FastPattern.matcher: ([\w: ]+) ([-\w.]+) *(?:.+)? *(sshd)\[\d+\]: error: PAM: Authentication failure for ([\w. ]+) from (.+)
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: error: PAM: Authentication failure for \S+ from \S+

FastPattern.description: 68, UserLogonFailure, auth could not identify password
FastPattern.matcher: ([\w: ]+) ([-\w]+) *(?:.+)? *(sshd)\[\d+\]: pam_unix\(.+?\): auth could not identify password for \[(.+)\]
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]:.*?auth could not identify password for
sshd\[\d+\]: [^:]+: error trying to bind as user "[^"]+"

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) *(?:.+)? *(sshd)\S*\[\d+\]: User=([-\w@. ]*) tty=(\w+) host=([-\w.]+) failed to login after (\d+) attempts.*
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\S*\[\d+\]: User=.*? tty=\w+ host=[-\w.]+ failed to login after \d+ attempts
debug login: pam_bigip_authz: pam_sm_acct_mgmt returning status \S+
sshd\S*\[\d+\]: User \S+ from \S+ not allowed because not listed in AllowUsers

FastPattern.description: 78, ServiceWarning failed: Cannot assign requested address

FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: userauth_hostbased mismatch: client sends [^,]+, but we resolve [\d.]+ to [\d.]+

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) .*?(\w+)\[\d+\]: ([^:]+): ([^:]+): User not known to the underlying authentication module for (\S+) from ([-\w.]+)
FastPattern.pattern: error: PAM: User not known to the underlying authentication module for \S+ from [-\w.]+

FastField.defaultValue: User not known to the underlying authentication module for "$6" from "$7"

FastPattern.description: 84, ServiceWarning sshd: {dispatch_protocol_error; Could not get shadow information, Could not load host key}
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: .*(?:dispatch_protocol_error|Could not get shadow information|Could not load host key)

FastPattern.description: 85, ServiceWarning sshd: reverse mapping failed, Bad protocol version identification, Broken pipe
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: (?:reverse mapping checking.+?failed|sshd secure channel: (?:Bad protocol version identification|atomicio failed: Broken pipe))
sshd\S*\[\d+\]: user=.*? partition=\S+ level=\S+ tty=\w+ host=[-\w.]+ attempts
sshd\[\d+\]: Bad protocol version identification '[^']*' from [\d.]+

FastPattern.description: 94, ServiceInfo sshd: Disconnecting: Corrupted padlen 2 on input
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: Disconnecting: Corrupted padlen 2 on input.

FastPattern.description: null pam_get_item returned a password; getting password
